page.title: 03A GIRL'S DAY
page.content: ON SATURDAY I WENT SHOPPING WITH MY DAD.FIRST WE WENT TO THE LIBRARY,THEN WE WENT TO GET THE SHOPPING OF BACON,SAUSAGES AND MEAT.WE WENT TO {McDONALDS}TO HAVE LUNCH.WE HAD TWO COKES,TWO HAMBURGERS AND FRENCH- FRIES.WHILE WE WERE IN LEIGH MY MUM,CHRISTINE,JOANNE AND BABY MICHAEL WERE IN{LIVERPOOL}SHOPPING.JOANNE WAS LOOKING AT WEDDING DRESSES AND THEY WENT ON A TRAIN TO LIVERPOOL.THEN THEY WENT TO THE{"BEATLE CITY".}I THINK PETER WAS WATCHING A{FOOTBALL {MATCH.}MY MUM AND CHRISTINE CAME BACK AND WE HAD POTATO-PIE FOR TEA.AFTERWARDS I HAD A BATH THEN MY MUM AND DAD WENT OUT TO THE PUB. CHRISTINE, TONY AND I HAD LEFTOVER POTATO PIE AND FISH,CHIPS AND GRAVY. THEN I WENT TO BED.
